title: Broadcom nixes bid for Qualcomm
text:
Broadcom nixes bid for Qualcomm Wednesday, March 14, 2018 - 01:29 
Singapore-based Broadcom withdrew its $117 billion bid for Qualcomm, two days after U.S. President Donald Trump blocked it citing national security concerns. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Singapore-based Broadcom withdrew its $117 billion bid for Qualcomm, two days after U.S. President Donald Trump blocked it citing national security concerns. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
